title: Bill Maher smokes in "real time"?
subtitle: Bill Maher seemed really smoked in February 2016 recording "The Real Time with Bill Maher," but the FCC doesn't bother him.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Bill Maher smoked weed during a live broadcast of "The Real Time with Bill Maher" and "The Federal Competition Commission" imposed a heavy fine.
